content:
Complete Blood Count (CBC) results:
- WBC: 7.5 x10^9/L (Normal: 4.5-11.0)
- RBC: 4.8 x10^12/L (Normal: 4.2-5.4)
- Hemoglobin: 14.2 g/dL (Normal: 13.5-17.5)
- Hematocrit: 42% (Normal: 38.8-50)
- Platelets: 250 x10^9/L (Normal: 150-450)
All values within normal range.

MRI of the lumbar spine shows:
- Mild degenerative disc disease at L4-L5
- No significant spinal stenosis
- No herniated discs
- Normal alignment of vertebral bodies
- No compression fractures

12-lead ECG interpretation:
- Normal sinus rhythm
- Heart rate: 72 bpm
- PR interval: 160ms
- QRS duration: 90ms
- QT interval: 380ms
- No ST segment changes
- No significant abnormalities detected

Chest CT scan findings:
- Small nodule in right upper lobe (3mm)
- Clear lungs otherwise
- No pleural effusions
- Normal heart size
- No mediastinal lymphadenopathy

Metabolic Panel results:
- Sodium: 140 mEq/L (Normal: 135-145)
- Potassium: 4.0 mEq/L (Normal: 3.5-5.0)
- Chloride: 102 mEq/L (Normal: 96-106)
- CO2: 24 mEq/L (Normal: 23-29)
- Glucose: 95 mg/dL (Normal: 70-100)
- BUN: 15 mg/dL (Normal: 7-20)
- Creatinine: 0.9 mg/dL (Normal: 0.6-1.2)

Abdominal ultrasound findings:
- Normal liver size and echotexture
- No gallstones
- Normal pancreas
- Normal spleen
- No ascites
- Normal kidneys bilaterally

Chest X-ray interpretation:
- Clear lungs
- Normal heart size
- No pleural effusions
- No pneumothorax
- Normal mediastinal contours

Thyroid Function Test results:
- TSH: 2.5 mIU/L (Normal: 0.4-4.0)
- Free T4: 1.2 ng/dL (Normal: 0.8-1.8)
- Free T3: 3.1 pg/mL (Normal: 2.3-4.2)
All values within normal range

Brain MRI findings:
- No mass lesions
- No acute infarcts
- Normal ventricular size
- No hydrocephalus
- Normal pituitary gland
- No significant white matter changes

Lipid Panel results:
- Total Cholesterol: 180 mg/dL (Normal: <200)
- HDL: 55 mg/dL (Normal: >40)
- LDL: 100 mg/dL (Normal: <100)
- Triglycerides: 150 mg/dL (Normal: <150)
All values within normal range
